title: Show per-task quality audit results in the internal portal UI
scope: Extend the internal portal intent detail view to surface per-task quality audit outcomes from the latest run.
Display pass/fail status, blockers, and key functional/non-functional statuses per task.
Do not change the audit report schema; only improve rendering and discoverability.
acceptance: Intent detail view shows per-task quality audit status for each planned task when reports exist.
Missing per-task reports are clearly shown as missing (not silently ignored).
The UI links or references the underlying report paths for debugging.

deliverables.title: Portal UI reads and renders per-task quality audit JSON reports
acceptance: Portal reads `status/audit/<INTENT_ID>/runs/<run_id>/tasks/<TASK_ID>/quality_audit.json` for the latest run.
Portal renders a compact per-task status summary including gate + blockers.
evidence: Refreshing an intent page shows per-task audit statuses for INT-010.
A missing task report appears as an explicit missing row with the expected path.

subtasks.title: Extend portal read-model to locate the latest per-task quality audit reports for an intent run.
done_when: Portal can locate and read per-task reports for the latest run consistently.
Missing reports are reported as missing with expected paths.

subtasks.title: Render a per-task quality audit summary table in the intent detail UI.
done_when: UI renders gate/functional/nonfunctional status per task.
UI displays blockers and links/pointers to the JSON report.
